Thanks for reply.
I agree with you, if notMerge is set to be false, it will only update the changed part but it re-render whole chart which I want to avoid.
In my case, I have render scatter plot which large amount of data and later I just call setOption to show/hide graphics element of type image on some event, But each time I call setOption, it re-render whole chart which I want to avoid in this case. Is their any way to do this.

Hi. In short, this feature is included in the download from http://echarts.baidu.com/download.html but not for the npm 4.1.0 release.

This is our release mistake and sorry for the confusion. Due to the long release time since this is our first release after we joined Apache, there are some patches that added after the first release candidate. This makes some new commits are merged in our final release at http://echarts.baidu.com/download.html but npm release is already published. Sorry again and hopefully we will not make this problem again.

我下载了3.8.4版本和4.0.4版本的echarts，都出现了上述的这个问题。官方实例的第一个，[http://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=gauge](http://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=gauge)，
添加
```javascript
axisLabel: {
                  color: "#000" 
            },
```
的配置之后数字会正常变黑，但是相同的配置复制到我自己的代码中时不正常显示效果
不好意思，一直运行的是3.4.0版本的echarts，问题解决

这个问题可以稳定复现， 它的严重行在于，在最后一张图的状态，由于“无中心节点”， 客户无法返回上层节点“虚构”/"非虚构"， 给人的感觉是卡死了。 其实是“”非虚构“”遮挡住了“中心节点”。
sorry, close by mistake.
gl 请求报错啊，官网的证书也是不安全的啊，求赶快修复下啊
整个都是canvas层，现在怀疑是否跟其他控件冲突了，用的bootstrap
+1 我也是，因为数据异步加载，初始化的时候肯定是没数据的
你好，在用arcgis自己发布的底图集成echarts时使用coorsystem为geo时怎么设置geo各个配置项啊，特别是geo里面的map属性，这个怎么设置啊，用自己arcgis发布的底图是不是需要重写echarts里面的一些方法，比如datatopoint等方法
原来这个是emphasis中的label，但文档中明明写着默认关闭（false）。。看来是默认开启，手动关闭即可
没问题啊，用了堆叠就是在之前的系列往上，视频广告 150 是堆在 1200 和 220 上面的，所以显示的数据在 1200+220+150 的位置。你不需要这种效果的话把 stack 去了。
刚访问了下可以查看了 http是好的，  但是 https 的能查到列表数据，但是图表不能展示。现在 过了会  gl 网站好像又挂了
原来是这样, 非常感谢 😂

I got this error after updating ngx-echarts to version 4.0.0. Downgrading to 3.2.0 solved the issue for me.

It's working fine when using this combination of packages:

"@angular-devkit/build-angular": "^0.6.8",
"@types/echarts": "0.0.13",
"echarts": "^4.1.0",
"ngx-echarts": "^3.2.0"

----

**Update**

After updating all packages to @latest, it's working fine too:

"@angular-devkit/build-angular": "^0.7.4",
"@types/echarts": "^4.1.0",
"echarts": "^4.1.0",
"ngx-echarts": "^4.0.0"

文档中也确实没有表明china.js可以按需加载：[可以按需引入的模块列表](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/index.js)

不知能否做增强

我修改了zrender的代码。可以把图形的背景色都透明
也可以通过echart传个颜色过来进行拓展
// Path.js

@Nilegfx It seems that there is a problem with using property "label" in "series" on version 4.1. This bug seems to be related to zrender. To fix the issue you have to revert to version 4.0.4 or wait until it is resolved in newer version.

Hi all, this bug is fixed in https://github.com/ecomfe/zrender/commit/0cc622196d8665f40d02b6156450cc7a87fe3a67 and please wait for the next release. 
By the time, you may revert to 4.0.4 version as jaworek suggested, or build the source code by yourself. Sorry for the inconvenience.

This sounds like a bug to me, if you can add a series via `setOption`, then you should be able to remove a series as well. Here's a quick reproducer of this bug:

http://jsfiddle.net/douykvbc/

Clicking on `One Line` and then `Two Lines` => works

Clicking on `Two Lines` and then `One Line` => doesn't work
@100pah I've noticed you added the `new-feature` label, but I believe this is a bug. Please see my post above.

Has anyone solved this yet? I need something similar--my log axis won't update with new values no matter what setting I use for the interval. I'm using a custom chart if that makes any difference. Thanks

+1，可能与 ‘[Enhance] 类目轴优化：当没有足够空间时，优化了轴的提示标志（axisTick）和标签（axisLabel）的展示策略。’ 有关系？ 目前强制 xAxis.axisLabel.interval 为 0，才能显示正常。

遇到了同样的问题
@forprogram  请问你是怎么解决的呢?
@LYlanfeng 我理解了一下源码，这里不应该增加一个额外的配置项。这个问题本质上是由于计算得到坐标轴文字过于密集，而使用 interval 将数据的间隙设大，而实际上 AngleAxis 文字的重叠方式计算需要对这一方法进行重载。我后面会再改下，PR 就先 close 了，感谢贡献！
